description:
In Ultimate NES™ Remix on
Nintendo 3DS, players take on
bite-sized challenges based on classic
Nintendo titles such as Super Mario
Bros., Metroid and more. Remix
stages rework the rules and give these
games all-new twists: characters turn
up in unfamiliar places, screens are
flipped upside down and colours are
swapped around!
name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
